name: Low-Carb Chicken and Vegetable Soup
author: casmith30
summary: Wholesome and hearty low-carb meal. The deliciously rich flavor is created by using Better Than Bouillon® chicken soup base.
ingredients: 2 cups frozen riced cauliflower, thawed and drained
2 teaspoons chicken soup base (such as Better Than Bouillon®)
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Heat oil in a 6-quart Dutch oven over medium-high heat
Add chicken thighs and sear, 2 to 3 minutes per side
Add carrots and celery to the pan
Reduce heat to medium and cook until softened, about 10 minutes
Add onions and cook until translucent, about 5 minutes
Reduce heat to low and add chicken stock, water, green beans, riced cauliflower, broccoli, tomato sauce, soup base, bay leaf, salt, and pepper
Add chicken thighs and simmer until no longer pink at the bone and the juices run clear, 30 to 45 minutes
An instant-read thermometer inserted near the bone should read 165 degrees F (74 degrees C)
Place shredded chicken back in the soup and serve
